description: Presidential Secretariat - Appointed Hon. A. D. S. Premajayantha MP & 09 others as Ministers w.e.f. 28.01.2013. Appointed Hon. R. P. Abeygunawardena & 02 others as Ministers w.e.f. 28.01.2013. Appointed Hon. S. M. Chandrasena MP & 05 others as Deputy Ministers w.e.f. 28.01.2013. Hon. A. D. S. Premajayantha MP & 04 other Hon. Ministers have resigned their Offices w.e.f. 28.01.2013. Hon. S. M. Chandrasena M.P & 12 other Hon. Deputy Ministers have resigned their Offices w.e.f. 28.01.2013.
